nodes.name: Google Sheets - Update Row with data

documentId.cachedResultName: AI Agent for Automated Company Research & Lead Enrichment

parameters.content:
## ğŸ¤– AI Agent: Automated Company Research

This workflow uses an AI agent to automatically research companies from a Google Sheet and enrich it with valuable data.

---

### ğŸš€ **Features**

From just a company name, the AI agent can find:
- Company Domain & LinkedIn URL
- Market Focus (B2B or B2C)
- Pricing Information (Cheapest Plan, Enterprise Plan)
- Free Trial Availability
- API Availability
- Software Integrations
- Link to the latest Case Study

---

### ğŸ› ï¸ **How to Use**

**1. Copy the Google Sheet:**
- [Click here to get the Google Sheet template.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1_F_An3yLSCsjgLN5w9RcJN-lJj_6mUT1nngMJPYws2Y/edit?usp=sharing)
- Make a copy for your own Google Drive.

**2. Configure the Google Sheets Nodes:**
- In the "Get rows to enrich" and "Google Sheets - Update Row with data" nodes, connect your Google Account and select the sheet you just created.

**3. Add Your Credentials:**
- **OpenAI:** Add your API key to the "OpenAI Chat Model" node.
- **Search Tool:** This template provides two options for search. You only need one.
    - **SerpAPI (Easy):** Add your key to the "SerpAPI - Search Google" node.
    - **ScrapingBee (Cheaper):** Add your key to the "Search Google with ScrapingBee" node. *Make sure to connect this node to the AI Agent instead of the SerpAPI one if you use it.*

**4. Run the Workflow:**
- Add company names to your Google Sheet under the `input` column.
- Run the workflow manually or set the schedule to run automatically.

---

### ğŸ’¡ **Customize Your Research**

The real power is in customization!
- **AI Prompt:** Modify the "AI company researcher" node to ask for different information.
- **Output Format:** Update the "Structured Output Parser" to match the new data points you've requested in the prompt.

documentId.cachedResultName: AI Agent for Automated Company Research & Lead Enrichment

parameters.content:
### Process One by One

This Split in Batches node ensures companies are researched individually. This makes the workflow more stable and easier to debug.

ğŸ¯ **Define Your Output**

Specify the exact JSON schema the AI should follow for its response. This must match the data you request in the main AI prompt.

ğŸ§  **The AI's Brain**

This is the main prompt! Edit the text here to tell the AI exactly what information to find.
Get your free API key here https://serpapi.com/

â–¶ï¸ **Activate**

Run the workflow manually or activate the schedule trigger to run it automatically.

parameters.text:
=This is the company I want you to research info about:
{{ $json.company_input }}

Return me:
- the linkedin URL of the company
- the domain of the company. in this format ([domain].[tld])
- market: if they are B2B or B2C. Only reply by "B2B" or "B2C"
- the lowest paid plan the company is offering. If you are not sure, reply null.
- the latest case study URL published on the website (find case study hub using google, and return the first case study link)
- tell me if the company offer an API
- tell me if the company has an enterprise plan
- tell me if the company has a free trial mentionned in their homepage. reply false if you don't find strong evidence.
- return an array with up to 5 tools the company is integrated with

parameters.name: search_google
parameters.description: Call this tool to get results from a google search.

parameters.content:
### Cost-Effective Search ğŸ’°

ScrapingBee can be a cheaper alternative to SerpAPI for Google searches.

Get your free API key at [scrapingbee.com](https://www.scrapingbee.com/).

**Remember to connect this tool to the AI Agent if you use it!**

ğŸ“„ **Get Your Sheet!**

[Grab the Google Sheet template here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1_F_An3yLSCsjgLN5w9RcJN-lJj_6mUT1nngMJPYws2Y/edit?usp=sharing) and follow the main "Read Me" instructions to set it up.
